item.title: Maxxor
item.description: No OverWorlder has ever seen Maxxorâ€™s face in battle because he is always on the frontline, leading the charge! Background Maxxor is an OverWorld Hero and ruler of the OverWorld Tribe. Even though it hasn’t been explicitly proven, Maxxor descends from Vlar, a thief once renegade by the OverWorld Tribe, as indicated at the very end of A Gigantic Mission. It’s also believed that Maxxor has at least some kinship degree with the rebellious Prantix and Accato and, in a savage branch of his genealogy, there’s Cromaxx, a nearly identical, yet stronger and almost barbaric version of him.
